column5: Beautiful private house apartment with keypad entry.  1 bedroom duplex for exclusive use of my Airbnb guests.  I live in main house.  Queen bed and 2 twin beds to accommodate 4.  Uber and Lyft access.  Driving distance-  10 min to Space Center NASA, Hobby Airport, Pearland, Baybrook Mall, ClearLake, Webster, Friendswood 20 min to Downtown, NRG 30 min to Kemah, Galveston, Texas City 45 min to IAH Bush International Airport  Uber code 2MLGC for $20 credit first time drivers. Lyft code - MAP832
